reviews.review: jest spoko ale nie mam z kim grać
You can kill people good game

Good game for fans of 4v1 Horror Games.

You either take on the role as the Survivor or a Killer.

As a survivor you goal is to repair generators and escape the trial, whilst trying to avoid the killer catching you.

As a Killer your goal is to find and kill all of the Survivors before they escape the trial. Each killer has a unique ability that can either help you chase, detect or control areas of the map. Using these abilities effectively is the difference between a decent killer player and a good killer player.

Each character can bring up to 4 perks into the game that you can use to try and swing the game into your favour. However as a Killer it is your 4 perks against up to 16 survivor perks! Some perks are bad but others are game changing and can really give you the deciding factor in the game if you use them effectively.

One thing to remember is, you will make mistakes. You will get caught quickly sometimes or a good survivor will take you on a very long chase, but the learning curve is there and you will get better, you will figure out what other players do and you will try to counter them better as you play more.

Господи блять, почините анимации ради бога.

Un jeu auquel je joue encore par addiction mais il faut admettre que depuis le nouveau matchmaking, le jeu perd énormément de son intérêt.
Tous les joueurs trollent constamment, les tueurs se contentent de se focus sur un seul joueur, rendant la partie injouable. La communauté est devenue ultra toxique et le fun est à oublier si vous jouez seul.

Les jeu comporte aussi de nombreux bugs mais qui sont rarement gênant, la création de nouveaux tueurs, nouvelles map ou refonte des anciennes donnent beaucoup de relief à celui-ci.

Bref, après avoir joué intensément à DBD pendant 2 ans et plus de 3500h, il est temps pour moi de laisser la place aux autres. les tunnels et camps constants et une communauté toxique ont eu raison de ma persévérance.
Il n'y a plus aucun plaisir à retirer de ce jeu.

the crows talk to me at night

Really great game
Probably the most unworthy devs ive seen.

Any criticism you may have of the game is both unwanted by the devs and untolerated. People who give criticism are singled out by them.
Every other update breaks the game or introduces plethora of bugs that NEVER get fixxed. Devs make consistantly onesided balance changes, because of the nature of an asymetric game its pleasing to more people to buff the side that more people play, while nonstop shafting the otherside.

Very poorly balanced at any level of play higher than amateur as-well. I'd say only get the game if you have a full set of friends to just make your own lobby and play in with.
If not, I'd say in its current state give the game a pass and pray VHS is successful.

-The developers don't listen to their player base
-Every. Single. Update. Breaks the game in some way that takes weeks to fix, with existing content being locked out
-the new MMR system rewards the most toxic players and discourages good gameplay
-the developers remove custom content from twitch streamers who are critical of BHVR

tl;dr: toxicity is rewarded and it's only getting worse

要入坑的一定要慎重！
我是一个第五转过来的，游戏玩法呢已经是非常熟练了。但是吧，从操作角度来说，黎明确实更难一点。并且，这个游戏不太建议单排，一是沟通困难，还有就是自己一个人玩玩着玩着就还是比较枯燥的。有好友一起的可以考虑，单排的话还是慎重，人类单排比较难受，而且杀手方面的话，遇到那种车队啊联机连麦玩的那些都是很难招架得住的。我也是没有玩很久，确实单排不太快乐。就仅供建议。

great game but killers are shady at best nowadays
Do not under any circumstances, get this game.

As fun as this game might be, right now you should definitely not get it. It is by no means a bad game and very fun with friends, but there is one thing in this game that just completely ruins the experience: MMR. Match Made Ranking is hated and not wanted by the majority of the playerbase but the devs do not care about this and keep it in the game anyways, even after countless complains from the players. MMR will lead to unwinnable matches simply because you play against players who are so much more experienced with the game than you, for example game veterans who play since launch, simply because you got 1 4k match and the game now thinks you're a god. And yes, rank =/= skill I'm aware, but the new ranks = playtime, so if you go against 4 iridescent ranks for 5 games in a row, that simply kills the fun. Players who play more than you will always have the upper hand. 
The game overall is still great, but MMR is so frustrating and just ruins the experience sadly, hence I can only say do not get this game as of right now
